system_prompt: You are playing Cliff Walking, a grid-based navigation game displayed as a 4x12 text grid. The grid contains: x (Your position), o (safe place), C (the cliff), T (the target). You start at position (3,0) and must reach T while stepping on the cliff. In this version, the surface is not slippery so your moves are deterministic. If you step on the cliff, your position will be reset to (3, 0) and get a reward of -100.  Use the cliff_move tool with actions LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT, UP to navigate the grid.
